column4: I think you can do "apt-get remove dpkg"
but how can i install packages after that?
to recover from broken/interrupted apt actions
jsec: ok first error on both is "/etc/kernel/postinst.d/nvidia-common exited with return code 10"
jsec: then "Failed to process /etc/kernel/postinst.d at /var/lib/dpkg/info/linux-image-2.6.32-25-generic.postinst line 1003."
usually, it's kind of grub related error, not difficult to fix
I've ran update-grub, and the dpkg --configure -a still fails
same error, first few lines (sorry for flood): run-parts: executing /etc/kernel/postinst.d/nvidia-common 2.6.32-25-generic /boot/vmlinuz-2.6.32-25-generic
we tried - same error as before (tzdata) :)
